#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define sz 1005

int composite[sz+1];
int ans[sz+1];

void prime_store()
{
    int sqr_sz=(int)sqrt(sz);
    for(int i=3;i<=sqr_sz;i+=2)
    {
        if(!composite[i])
        {
            for(int j=i*i;j<=sz;j+=(2*i))
            {
                composite[j]=1;
            }
        }
    }
    for(int i=29;i<sz;i+=2)
    {
        ans[i]=ans[i-1];
        if(!composite[i])
        {
            ans[i]+=i;
        }
        ans[i+1]=ans[i];
    }
}
int main()
{
    int test;
    prime_store();
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d", &n);
        printf("%d\n", ans[n]);
    }
}
